pageContext.claim: “A very, very important provision of our new tax law -- America's governors have designated nearly 9,000 communities as the Opportunity Zones that we just discussed, including this very neighborhood surrounding Benedict College... And people are investing in these areas that would have never, ever been investing here. And in some cases, they're rich, and in some cases, they're not so rich, but the money is flowing into your community.”
pageContext.analysis: One neighborhood near Benedict College in South Carolina has been designated as an opportunity zone. Still, there are few federal accountability requirements for the zones and some reports suggest no one is investing in the designated areas.
